resources.string: Phototribe requires permission to access Images
Yes, I have READ ALL PUBLISHING GUIDELINES
Are you sure you want to logout \n Your Account?
Listen while travelling, working, shooting,etc to learn new trends, techniques, news, tricks, etc.

" Our mission at THE PHOTO MENTOR APP is to build an exclusive community of India's best visual arts professionals by creating an all inclusive library of India's most valuable educational resources, information, experiences, ideas, tutorials, opinions etc. We are dedicated to helping photographers/cinematographers/editors/students build rewarding careers, help improve your craft, and build a tight community. 
 RULES: 
 - Think before you post! Once your post is up, it's up for the world to see and often it is unlikely to be able to get it completely down.
 - A wrong or doubtful answer may result in misleading or confusion.
 - Respect yourself and others the same.
 - No Politics or Political Correctness.
 - Please do not invade people's privacy.
 - When answering please try to add value in to the conversation.
 - Be friendly and fair. Use common sense.
 - No cursing and no swearing in this group.
 - Please do not take someone's image and edit it without permission, it is really rude to do so.
 - No nasty, graphic, disturbing media.
 - You may show people what you do but please no advertising at all.
 - We respect each others opinions. Members are free to express themselves unless they violate other rules.
 - Trolling, tasteless, abusive/offensive/aggressive posts, comments and discussions may be removed at the discretion of the group admin. Trolls will be booted out of the group.
 - Fundamentally irrelevant content may be taken off.
 - Please do not repost contents that was removed since they were considered inappropriate.

These rules are really designed to keeping an enjoyable experience :)"
